question: NBA: Will the Cavaliers beat the Pistons by more than 5.5 points in their November 12th matchup?
description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for November 12th:

If the Cleveland Cavaliers win by over 5.5 points, the market will resolve to “Yes”.

If the Detroit Pistons lose by less than 5.5 points or win, the market will resolve “No.”

question: Will $GM be above $.000216 on November 19, 2021 (11:30 PM ET)?
description:
This is a market on whether the candlestick close price of $GM will be above $.000216 for the date and time of November 19, 2021, at 11:30 PM ET. 

The resolution source for this market will be prices listed on CoinGecko (https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/gm). 

This market will resolve to “Yes” if, according to the resolution source, $GM has a candlestick closing price of greater than $.000216 for the resolution date, November 19, 2021, 11:30 PM ET after 11:30 PM ET has passed. 
Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”. 

(To see the candlestick close price, click the candlestick icon, observe the number after the “C:” when you hover over a candlestick for a given time period.)

This market will resolve on the “C” (i.e. closing price) listed for the candle titled “Fri 19 November 2021, 23:30:00” with the “Price” tab selected, in the Eastern Time Zone. Note, this 23:30:00 candle lists the opening price for 11:00:00 PM ET and the closing price for 11:30:00 PM ET. To allow for updates, this market will resolve on the number listed for the referenced candle at exactly 11:50:00 PM ET, on November 19, 2021. Note: If the candlestick closing price is exactly $.000216, the market will resolve "No." If CoinGecko is unavailable at resolution time, another source will be used.
